title: Brand New 3 story Buliding for rent
details:
No Agent No Brokers No Time Wasters Please Contact Below Named For More Information Or Any Clarification

බ්‍රෝකර්වරැ අනවයයි


ඔබ සැබැ නිර්ව්‍යාජ ගැණුම්කරැවෙක් නම්....... ලිපිනයන් පාරවල් විස්තර අසමින් අපහසුතාවයට පත් නොවි මෙම දේපළට පැමිනිමට පළමුව කරුණාකර පැහැදිලිවම කලින් දින වේලාවක් වේන්කර ගෙන පැමිනෙන්න එසේ නොමැතිව අපහසු තාවයට පත් නොවන්න කරුණාකර දැන්විම සමිපුර්නයෙන් කියවීමෙන් පසුව අප අමතන්න.


Brand New Modern Building Approximately 6,000sq.ft .

9 Perch Of Land Extent (final Stage In Construction) To Be Rent For Modern Showroom/office / Bank For Rent –in Hart Of Maharagama City. -

the Building Is Located In The City Center – Maharagama Facing Piliyandala Main Road - Basement With Parking For 5-6 Vehicle Security Room 20x15


Ground Floor And 1st Floor 52x32ft Modern Type Roof Top 52x32 With Roof - All Modern Facilities - Fully Tiled Floors - Front View Completed With Glass -400kg Lift Specially Ideal For Bank (hence No Bank At All In Piliyandala Road) Or Else Office, Showroom, Clothing Store, Reputed Company, Customer Care Or Any Prominent Commercial Ventures.


Rent And Lease Terms Can Be Negotiated Upon Inspection.

Approximately 4lkhs Per Month For Whole Unit With Resolvable Month


Do Not Miss Out On This Great Opportunity As You Will Not Find a Better Location Than This In Maharagama.
